HOME_TITLETEXT: This website is a dynmic guideline, that provides helpful information to create a mobile and responsive website.
ABOUT_ABOUTTEXT:
This Development Page and the belonging content consists of the materials researched in the thesis
Usability Guideline for Porting into Mobile Environment
Semester 2014/2015
Daniel Eckelt, Mat-Nr.: 36443
FLEX_EXAMPLETEXT: The specification describes a CSS box model optimized for user interface design. In the flex layout model, the children of a flex container can be laid out in any direction, and can “flex” their sizes, either growing to fill unused space or shrinking to avoid overflowing the parent. Both horizontal and vertical alignment of the children can be easily manipulated. Nesting of these boxes (horizontal inside vertical, or vertical inside horizontal) can be used to build layouts in two dimensions. CSS is a language for describing the rendering of structured documents (such as HTML and XML) on screen, on paper, in speech, etc.
RESO_EXAMPLETEXT: Differently scaled images dependent on screen resolution of device!
SIDEMENU_EXAMPLETEXT: Some tests for own created sidemenu with collapse button.
BAND_GALLERY_TEXT: The Bandgallery is a own created gallery, that allows the adding of pictures, which get ordered in colums fullscreen. Added navigation buttons let you scroll automatically from picture to picture.
